ComicInfo.Summary:
Battle Action returns with an all-new, five-issue mini-series of thrilling war tales!
Each issue features two brand new stories from today’s top talent. In this first issue, famous flyboy Johnny Red and his Falcon Squadron return to hunt down sneaky German raiders in the skies of World War Two, written by Garth Ennis (The Boys, Preacher) and with art by Keith Burns (Out of the Blue).
A brand new HMS Nightshade story by John Wagner (Judge Dredd) in a tale about the bonds of friendship forged during naval battles, drawn by Dan Cornwell (Rok of the Reds).
This newsstand edition features a gorgeous cover by Keith Burns, showing HMS Nightshade in action on the high seas!
Don’t miss future issues with stories by Torunn Grønbekk (Thor, Punisher War Journal), Chris Burnham (Batman), Rob Williams (Suicide Squad), Dan Abnett (Guardians of the Galaxy), and more!
